name: kikd
description: Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment for Open Sourced NPM Tooling.

scripts.?info: echo Display information about the scripts.
scripts.?kd: echo Run kikd with the current code.
scripts.?build: echo Dogfooding building kikd with rollup using itself.
scripts.?precommit: echo Run tests, ensure there is no duplicate code, and then check staged commits for linting and style.
scripts.precommit: npm-run-all test inspect && lint-staged -c ./dx/lint-staged.config.js && yarn run sloc
scripts.?commitmsg: echo Verify the commit message matches our standards
scripts.?clean: echo Just remove the dist directory.
scripts.?pretty: echo Clean up the style for all of the source code.
scripts.?inspect: echo Check for duplicate code through the packages.
scripts.?lint: echo Lint both source code and tests
scripts.?lint:commits: echo Lint commit messages (run in CI).
scripts.?lint:src: echo Lint the source code with an extended Airbnb style.
scripts.?lint:tests: echo Lint the tests with an extended Airbnb style.
scripts.?test: echo Run all of the tests in our test suite
scripts.test: npm-run-all test:tape test:kape test:executor test:check-package test:publish-check test:find-packages
scripts.?test:tape: echo Run tests using babel/tape/tape-bdd/blue-tape, with tap-spec output.
scripts.?test:kape: echo Run tests using and for Kape.
scripts.?test:executor: echo Run tests for KLI Executor using Kape.
scripts.?test:check-package: echo Run tests for KIKD Check Package using Kape.
scripts.?test:publish-check: echo Run tests for KIKD Publish Checking using Kape.
scripts.?test:find-packages: echo Run tests for KIKD Find Packages using Kape.
scripts.?test:recommend-version: echo Run tests for KIKD Recommend Version using Kape.
scripts.?sloc: echo Print the number of lines of source code we have.
scripts.sloc: echo 'Lines of source code: ' && sloc src/node_modules/ -f json  --exclude .*test.* | jq '.summary.source'
scripts.?update: echo Update version number of packages.
scripts.?watch: echo Run tests, linting, and line counting every time a file changes.
scripts.?postrewrite: echo Update what commits git tags are pointing to after an amend/rebase.
scripts.?postversion: echo Update the indentation of the package.json, re-commit it, and then create a git tag for the new version.
scripts.postversion: js-beautify -r package.json && PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | jq '.version' --raw-output) && git commit -a -m "docs(version): Release v$PACKAGE_VERSION." -m '[skip ci]' && git tag "v$PACKAGE_VERSION"
